results.task_name: Create a project from natural language
results.prompt_sent: Create a new project called "Mobile App Redesign". Set its status to active and add a description: "Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns." Also add the tags: mobile, redesign, ux.
results.model_response: I'll create the new project "Mobile App Redesign" with the specified details.

arguments.name: Mobile App Redesign
arguments.description: Complete redesign of the mobile application with new UX patterns.

results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 14e3c9e2de7e4d4dbe28c302e5ed8c7f. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.
results.model_response: I'll create that workunit for you right away.

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit def6435023e64961998f115f413647da:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
results.model_response: I'll create these three tasks for the specified workunit. Let me add each one:

results.prompt_sent: Mark task 5c4f77e505e04af78e665f6b2503d7f1 as currently in progress.
results.model_response: I'll mark task 5c4f77e505e04af78e665f6b2503d7f1 as in progress.

results.prompt_sent: Find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details including all tasks.
results.model_response: I'll help you find the workunit called "Fix Login Page Bug" and get its full details. Let me start by searching for it.

results.prompt_sent: Save a context note on workunit def6435023e64961998f115f413647da recording this decision: we chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure. This is a high-importance architectural decision.
results.model_response: I'll save this context note to the workunit with the architectural decision about password validation.

arguments.title: Password Validation Architecture Decision
arguments.content: We chose to fix the password validation on the backend rather than the frontend, because it's more secure.
